DOC.brief_summary: To assess whether ultrasound method predict outcome operative vaginal delivery nulliparous woman term singleton pregnancy prolong second stage labor . To compare different ultrasound assessment Compare digital assessment ultrasound finding . Investigate movement fetal head active push predictive factor Null hypotheses : - Ultrasound measurement predict outcomes operative vaginal delivery . - Ultrasound good digital examination predict delivery outcome . - Movement fetal head active push predictive factor .
DOC.brief_title: Can Ultrasound Predict Labor Outcome Operative Vaginal Deliveries ?
DOC.detailed_description: The physician responsible labor perform digital examination ( fetal station position cervical dilatation ) . Fetal station relate ischial spine -5 +4 describe WHO illustrate Figure 111 . Another obstetrician midwife blind result clinical examination perform ultrasound measurement . The physician responsible labor blind ultrasound measurement . Ultrasound examination contraction Due consideration describe , one recording/acquisition perform follow : A ) Head position B ) Head-perineum distance C ) Midline angle D ) Angle progression E ) 3D sagittal transperineal acquisition In addition single scan perform active push described B ) D ) ( 3D sagittal scan possible ) . A ) Head position Position assess 2D transabdominal scan describe Akmal4 3D transperineal scan describe Ghi et al22 . Fetal head position record clock divide circle 24 division Positions ≥02.30 ≤03.30 hour record leave occiput transverse position ≥08.30 ≤09.30 right occiput transverse . Positions > 03.30 < 08.30 record occiput posterior position > 09.30 < 02.30 occiput anterior . Head-perineum distance assess transperineal ultrasound . The woman examine lie flat ( almost flat ) bed flexed hip knee position . The bladder empty immediately ultrasound examination . Head-perineum distance measure short distance outer bony limit fetal skull perineum transabdominal transducer place transperineally labia transverse view ( posterior fourchette - posterior commissure labium minor ) Midline angle measure described Ghi22 . In transverse transperineal scan angle midline fetal head sagittal line maternal pelvis measure . This recording also perform transverse scan . Angle progression measure described Barbera Kalache angle long axis symphysis pubis tangent skull transperineal sagittal scan . The following outcome variable record upon delivery Main outcome - Time start vacuum assist traction delivery ( entire body deliver ) Secondary outcomes - Number contraction delivery - Number cup detachment - Successful/failed vaginal operative delivery - Forceps applied/not apply - Perineal tear - APGAR score newborn . - Arterial umbilical cord blood pH BD ( base deficit ) value . - Position delivery Statistics : The time interval start operative vaginal delivery delivery evaluate fetal head-perineum distance angle progression use survival analysis ( Kaplan-Meier analyse Cox regression analysis ) . Categorical variable analyze use Chi-square test Fischer exact test , continuous variable analyze use T-test Mann-Whitney U-test . The predictive value successful operative vaginal delivery evaluate use receiver-operating characteristic ( ROC ) curve . The area curve ( AUC , - 95 % CI ) consider discriminatory potential low limit CI exceed 0.5 . Ultrasound measurement , digital assessment station dilatation , induction labor , maternal age , gestational age birth weight analyze logistic regression analyse vaginal delivery vs. cesarean section dependent variable .
DOC.criteria: prolonged second stage labour Suspected asphyxia start vacuum extraction
